document.full_text: the united states nuclear regulatory commission said its 24-hour operations center had stopped monitoring the nuclear reactors at the fukushima daiichi plant because the situation there had improved.
document.title: asia: japan: u.s. agency to stop monitoring nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: the united states nuclear regulatory commission said its 24-hour operations center had stopped monitoring the nuclear reactors at the fukushima daiichi plant because the situation there had improved.
